name: John Doe
details: Bajlar was responsive and patient throughout the project. He completed the work in a timely manner and the final result was fantastic, highly recommended.

name: Sarah Smith
details: Bajlar is an absolute 10/10. He took fantastic initiative the whole way through. Very communicative and proactive in helping us get the best possible product built. Will be returning.

name: Robert Johnson
details: This guy is a professional, he prepared the frontend of our website in just a few days. The result has been amazing. We will repeat for sure. Thanks again man!
